page.title: 08Housing LISVANE
page.content:
Of sample tested, Types of houses- 76.25% Detached 11.25% Semi-detached 1.25% Terraced 2.5% Bungalows 6.25% Flats 1.25% Farmhouses 1.25% Public houses Age of houses in years- 0-5 22% 6-10 6% 11-15 11% 16-20 23% 21-25 18% 26-30 5% 31-35 5% 35+ 10% How long occupied by present owners, 0-1 17% 1-2 17% 2-3 4% 3-4 17% 4-5 10% 5-6 4% 6-7 7% 7-8 7% 8-9 4% 9-10 4% 10-11 4% 12+ 5%
Nearly all houses are owner occupied with one small development of council houses. There is a great deal of housing development going on at the present.
